attributes.action: Drop accepting the backdoor EU constitution including the forced maximum 48hr working week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the above EU constitution is sneaked through this will result in one item in paticular coming into force, which is the maximum 48hr working week effectively an overtime ban. crippling many families who rely on this to survive. What is wrong with this goverment they seem hell bent on robbing us and industry please sign this petition to hopefully do something about it.
